original_title: Bestiario: Un homenaje a Chris Marker
overview: Inspired by Chris Marker's Bestiary. The short film is divided into three parts, each one will deal with the inner world of specific animals through a specific theme, and together they will give us a common vision of their inner life. The different pieces show specific situations: in the first the gestures of an animal, in the second different realities of some animals and the third an animal listening to music.
tagline: An Animal Is an Animal Is an Animal...
title: Bestiary: A Tribute to Chris Marker
